daily_plan_req: Isabella Rodriguez plays hide and seek all day every day.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella Rodriguez is one of the best hide and seek players around who loves to hide in the hide and seek game. She is always looking for ways to improve her strategy in hiding so Klaus can't find her.
currently: Isabella has agreed to meet Klaus at Johnson Park at 1:30am to start their first game of hide-and-seek of the day. She can hide anywhere in town.
lifestyle: Isabella awakes at 1am and plays hide and seek all over town.
